definition: surname Wei/ancient Chinese state near present day Chongqing/Taiwan pr. [Wei2]

sentences.english: The growers are busy day and night, with harvest smile on his face.
sentences.chinese: 果农们日夜忙碌，脸上带着丰收的微笑。

sentences.english: When you peep out the successful smiling face.
sentences.chinese: 当你外面偷看时成功微笑的脸。

sentences.english: Up. He was still smiling, but his ocher eyes were serious.
sentences.chinese: 他还是微笑着，但他黑金色的眸子显得很认真。

sentences.english: They linger and look at your face and smile mere idle sport.
sentences.chinese: 它们留连下落拓地看着你的脸微笑着。

sentences.english: the sunshine greets me with a smile.
He smiled and touched the ground with his hand, meaning that I should sit down.
sentences.chinese: 他微笑着并用手轻触着地面，示意我坐下。

sentences.english: It is the tea of the earth that keep here smiles in bloom.
sentences.chinese: 是大地的泪点，使她的微笑连结着青春不谢。

sentences.english: Lisette 's large red mouth broke into a most alluring smile.
sentences.chinese: 莉莎特的鲜红的大嘴露出了一副极为诱人的微笑。

sentences.english: He smiled to see the children's frolics .
sentences.chinese: 他看到孩子们嬉戏而微笑。

sentences.english: It is the terms of the earth that kept her smiles in bloom .
sentences.chinese: 大地的泪珠，使她的微笑如花一般灿烂不谢。

sentences.english: Smiling at the Dornish knights, she switched back to the Common Tongue.
sentences.chinese: 边对多恩骑士微笑，她边转换成通用语。

sentences.english: Smile. The best thing always happen when you are not expected.
sentences.chinese: 微笑吧，最好的事总是发生在最不经易的时候。
画一幅照片式完美的微笑。

sentences.english: Nothing can be more beautiful than the smile free from tears.
sentences.chinese: 没有什么可以比无泪的微笑更美丽。

sentences.english: Don't cry because it cames to an end, smile because it happened.
sentences.chinese: 不要因为他的结束而哭泣，应当为它的发生而微笑。

sentences.english: The sun rose and smiled on it.
sentences.chinese: 太阳升上来了，向无名花微笑。

definition: to have a smile on one's face
expression or emotion showing in one's eyes/meaningful glance/wink/eyesight (dialect)
